question: 応募する
sourceAnswer: To Apply For, To Enlist, To Answer An Ad
activeAnswer: To Apply For, To Enlist, To Answer An Ad
sourceMnemonic: If <ja>応募</ja> is "application" then the verb version is <vocabulary>to apply for</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to enlist</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as <ja>応募</ja>'s reading, though knowing the readings of the kanji will take care of things too.
